## Price.interval property

The frequency at which a subscription is billed. One of `day`<!-- -->, `week`<!-- -->, `month` or `year`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly interval: "day" | "month" | "week" | "year" | null;
```
